    • contains

      public boolean contains(@Nonnull Vector3 v)
      Checks if given point v is within the bounds of this solid.
      Specified by:
      contains in interface Solid
      Parameters:
      v - The point to check
      Returns:
      true if the distance between the center of this sphere and v is equal to or less than this sphere's radius

    • contains

      public boolean contains(@Nonnull Face f)
      Checks if given face f is within the bounds of this solid. This only returns true if all vertices of this face are within the bounds of this solid.
      Specified by:
      contains in interface Solid
      Parameters:
      f - The face to check
      Returns:
      true if all vertices of the face are within the bounds of this sphere

    • contains

      public boolean contains(@Nonnull Solid s)
      Checks if this solid completely encapsulates the other solid.
      Specified by:
      contains in interface Solid
      Parameters:
      s - The solid to compare to
      Returns:
      true if this sphere contains the given solid s

    • overlaps

      public boolean overlaps(@Nonnull Face f)
      Checks if this solid overlaps the given face f.
      Specified by:
      overlaps in interface Solid
      Parameters:
      f - The face to compare to
      Returns:
      true if this sphere overlaps with the given face f

    • overlaps

      public boolean overlaps(@Nonnull Solid s)
      Checks if this solid overlaps another solid. This returns true if there is at least one point in common between the two solids.
      Specified by:
      overlaps in interface Solid
      Parameters:
      s - The solid to compare to
      Returns:
      true if the two solids overlap

    • intersects

      public boolean intersects(@Nonnull Ray ray)
      Checks if the given ray intersects this solid. This method favors speed over accuracy, and may not be entirely accurate.
      Specified by:
      intersects in interface Solid
      Parameters:
      ray - The ray to check for intersection
      Returns:
      true if this sphere intersect the given ray

    • boundingBox

      @Nonnull public BoundingBox boundingBox()
      Returns the bounding box of this solid for rough physics calculations. Note that bounding boxes do not accurately represent the profile of this solid.
      Specified by:
      boundingBox in interface Solid
      Returns:
      The bounding box of this sphere
